entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Leverage System.Text.Json PipeReader feature in model binding and request parsing #60657
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot #60656
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #60655
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes #60654
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #60653
  • No wwwroot created on publish of an ASP.NET with React Project #60652
  • Blazor hybrid WPF app on .net 9.0 cannot load static asset #60649
  • Class library projects are added as assembly: ApplicationPart in razor application assembly #60648
  • An ASP.NET core application hangs at startup in AKS #60646
  • [dotnet-sdk-10.0.100-preview.2.25125.6] IAuthenticationService.ImplementationType returns Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationServiceImpl instead #60645
  • Event handlers (e.g., @onclick) not working in Blazor .NET 8 layout components #60640

Closed

  • Server URLs in OpenAPI document are incorrect when application used with .NET Aspire #57332
    10.0-preview3
  • Why is HybridCache Still in Preview After .NET 9 Release? #59702
  • Perf regression: json #60625
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json #60633
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #60642
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #60643
  • dotnet dev-certs issue with creating folder #59421
  • Improve interaction between enhanced nav and scroll position #51646
    10.0-preview3
  • Perf improvement: json #60613
  • Como hackear Instagram de Alguem #60638

PullRequests

Created

  • Only build BuildAfterTargeting pack on win-x64 #60658
    area-infrastructure
  • Unquarantine EventCountersAndMetricsValues and VerifyCountersFireWithCorrectValues #60651
    area-networking
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `2b6b042` to `e5669fd` #60647
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Support resolving OpenAPI server URLs from HttpRequest #60617
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 10.0-preview3
  • Scroll in enhanced navigation behaves same as in client side routing #60296
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-enhanced-navigation, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • Add support for ServerSentEventsResult and extension methods #60616
    area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Initial support for persisting component state #60634
    area-blazor
  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] #58218
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • update project templates use primary constructors #59712
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Clarify DefaultPolicy and FallbackPolicy Behavior in XML Docs #60619
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Fix for: Minimal APIs and controllers treat header arrays differently #58251
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
